name: Carl Zelinsky
text: Tasty sandwiches. Good portion for the cost. Absolutely great Philly Cheese Steak with mushrooms and caramelized onions. Making myself hungry now. See you there!

name: Jason Marchant
text: Always loved this place.  The food is good and the staff was helpful. Usually not to busy as well so you get served fast.

name: Odell Short
text: Steak and cheese sandwich was very good. The gentlemen behind the counter really did not want to serve us. He was rude.

name: Ken Kirchoff
text: Steak sandwichesare decent, but nothing to write home about  Took about 15 minutes to get five sandwiches.  Missed lettuce and tomato on my wife's simple sandwich, which wound up having just a small amount of well done roast beef and cheese.

name: Elizabeth Marshall
text: I had my mouth watering for a number 9, with extra peppers and mushrooms.  There was hardly any mushrooms and I got roasted resellers instead of grilled green,peppers like the website said was included and for which I paid extra for.  I surely did not enjoy my grinderðŸ˜¢ðŸ˜¢

name: Tom S
text: They routinely mess up my order. First time wrong bread.  Second time was even worse. Simply order large steak and cheese. Got a steak and cheese with peppers and mushrooms.  Told the rude  girl it was wrong. She remade it and this time got â€¦More

name: Sean Taylor
text: The food is always cooked fresh. I love their barbecue chicken. The rest of the family enjoys their steak sandwiches, especially the vermonter. Their prices are a little high, especially compared to subway, but the quality and taste of â€¦More

name: Adali Irizarry
text: Great place to eat. You will not be sorry. Good amount of food for the price. Best tuna sandwich right now in the whole state of Conn. Friendly service w/a smile.

name: Val DeJesus
text: Just picked up some lunch and this isn't the dangelos I usually go to but it was a lot closer than Southington today. Wonderful customer service and food was great. Clean small location. Good team!

name: ryan cyr
text: Fast. In my opinion better than subway

name: Steven Abramczyk
text: They are good normal sub/sandwich shop I like the menu

name: bunchy man
text: The general manager(Jeff) is very rude and ruined 3 sandwiches. I ordered 2 chicken teriyaki just (rice and chicken) for 2 of us. and a kids meatball for my little sister. We end up with 2 chicken #9s and a cheese and meatball grinder and â€¦More

name: Michael Cassella
text: I really like this place. Just wish the food was more consistent. Sometimes my grinders are  full and manly portions. Other times they wouldn't feed my 5y/o.. lol I can't complain about the flavor though. I always love the taste of my grinders even if they might not be super full.. lol enjoy the food at Dangelos with your family

name: TS Johnson
text: The southwest (chicken) rice bowl they have was good.

name: April Vaillancourt
text: Good I love their chicken cranberry pecan salad.

name: Alexis Gomez
text: Very very unprofessional environment.one of the staff members was there with her boyfriend during the 1 hour that I was there not even paying attention to the customers.On top of that she took him inside like he is a regular employee and â€¦More

name: marcelo maldonado
text: This location routinely fails to answer their phone during normal business hours.  You can let it ring and they just don't answer it.  If I were the owner I would want to know this.
